statements: SELECT * FROM Stock WHERE quantity > 10
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM Stock WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY sale_date DESC
SELECT id, product_name, quantity FROM Stock WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01' ORDER BY price ASC
SELECT product_name, price FROM Stock WHERE quantity = 0
SELECT id, product_name, sale_date FROM Stock WHERE price < 100
SELECT * FROM Stock WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY sale_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM Stock WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28'
SELECT id, product_name, quantity, price FROM Stock WHERE quantity < 100 AND price BETWEEN 20 AND 50 ORDER BY sale_date ASC
SELECT * FROM Stock WHERE product_name ILIKE 'apple%' AND quantity >= 50
SELECT id, product_name, price FROM Stock WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT * FROM sales WHERE sale_date > '2021-01-01'
SELECT product_id, quantity_sold FROM sales ORDER BY quantity_sold DESC
SELECT sale_date, total_price FROM sales WHERE total_price > 1000 AND sale_date < '2021-06-30'
SELECT product_id, current_quantity FROM stock ORDER BY current_quantity ASC
SELECT * FROM sales JOIN stock ON sales.product_id = stock.product_id
SELECT * FROM sales WHERE quantity_sold > 10 ORDER BY total_price DESC;
SELECT sale_date, product_id, quantity_sold FROM sales WHERE sale_date > '2020-01-01' AND sale_date < '2020-12-31';
SELECT product_id, SUM(quantity_sold) AS total_quantity_sold FROM sales GROUP BY product_id ORDER BY total_quantity_sold DESC;
SELECT s.*, st.current_quantity FROM sales s JOIN stock st ON s.product_id = st.product_id WHERE st.current_quantity < 50;
SELECT sale_id, sale_date, total_price FROM sales WHERE product_id = (SELECT product_id FROM stock ORDER BY last_updated DESC LIMIT 1);
SELECT * FROM stock LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM stock WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT id, sale_date, quantity_sold FROM sales WHERE sale_date >= '2022-01-01' AND sale_date <= '2022-01-31';
SELECT product_id, updated_quantity FROM stock_updates ORDER BY update_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_name, quantity, SUM(quantity_sold) AS total_sold FROM stock JOIN sales ON stock.id = sales.product_id GROUP BY product_name HAVING total_sold > 50 ORDER BY total_sold DESC;
SELECT * FROM stock WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM stock WHERE quantity <= 5 ORDER BY quantity ASC;
SELECT s.product_name, s.quantity, su.updated_quantity FROM stock s JOIN stock_updates su ON s.id = su.product_id WHERE su.update_date = '2022-07-15';

SELECT s.product_name, SUM(sa.quantity_sold) AS total_quantity_sold FROM stock s JOIN sales sa ON s.id = sa.product_id GROUP BY s.product_name HAVING total_quantity_sold > 100 ORDER BY total_quantity_sold DESC;
SELECT s.id, s.product_name, su.update_date, su.updated_quantity FROM stock s LEFT JOIN stock_updates su ON s.id = su.product_id WHERE su.updated_quantity IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM Sales;
SELECT id, sale_date, quantity FROM Sales WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT product_id, price FROM Products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 101;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_type, quantity_change FROM StockTransactions WHERE transaction_type = 'IN';
SELECT id, product_id, quantity, sale_date FROM Sales WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY sale_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_id, name, price, available_quantity FROM Products WHERE price < 50 ORDER BY price ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM Customers WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';

SELECT transaction_id, product_id, transaction_type, quantity_change, transaction_date FROM StockTransactions WHERE transaction_type = 'IN' AND quantity_change > 0 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM Sales s JOIN Products p ON s.product_id = p.product_id WHERE s.quantity < p.available_quantity ORDER BY s.quantity ASC, sale_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM stock;
SELECT product_id, quantity FROM stock WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT MAX(quantity) AS max_quantity FROM stock;
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM customers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT sale_id, total_price FROM sales WHERE total_price BETWEEN 1000 AND 2000 ORDER BY total_price ASC;
SELECT * FROM stock WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT sale_id, total_price FROM sales WHERE sale_date >= '2022-01-01' AND quantity_sold >= 10 ORDER BY total_price ASC;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE position = 'Manager' OR position = 'Supervisor';
SELECT log_id, log_date, log_message FROM sale_logs ORDER BY log_date DESC;
